```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(shiny)

library(tictoc)
#library(WDI)
library(wbstats)


environment <- c("EN.POP.DNST", "EN.ATM.CO2E.KT", "EN.ATM.GHGT.KT.CE", "EG.ELC.FOSL.ZS")
economy <- c("NY.GDP.MKTP.PP.CD", "NY.GDP.PCAP.PP.CD", "NE.RSB.GNFS.ZS")
society <- c("SP.POP.TOTL", "SP.POP.GROW")
all_indicators <- c(environment,economy,society)

tic()
df <- wb_data(country = "countries_only", indicator = all_indicators, start_date = 1980, end_date = 1980)
toc()
dim(df)
```

```{r}
selectInput("Indicator", "Indicator", c("EN.ATM.CO2E.KT", "SP.POP.TOTL", "NY.GDP.MKTP.PP.CD"), multiple = FALSE, selected="SP.POP.TOTL")
```
